```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> points = np.array([-2., 0., 3.])
>>> jv(0, points)
array([ 0.22389078,  1\.        , -0.26005195]) 
```

```py
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> x = np.linspace(-10., 10., 1000)
>>> for i in range(4):
...     ax.plot(x, jv(i, x), label=f'$J_{i!r}$')
>>> ax.legend()
>>> plt.show() 
```
